basics.name: Bogdan Carpusor
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Iâ€™m a full stack web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I've worked mostly at small size companies, in agile environments, so I am used to wearing many hats. I am a very product oriented developer who focuses on fast iterations and user feedback.

education.institution: University "Gheorghe Asachi" - Faculty of Automatics and Computer Engineering

work.summary: Built a SaaS product on enterprise learning management from the ground up together with three other friends.
highlights: PWA development using React and Redux
Development of a scalable REST API
Development of an automation service used in the admin flow of a training session

work.summary: While working at Cloudbase I was involved in different roles on multiple projects.
highlights: Management and administration of automation infrastructures
Automation testing for drivers used in Linux VMs on Azure and Hyper-V

work.summary: I have spent two months on an internship program focused on web development. Together with the other interns we were tasked with developing an internal web platform for the company.
highlights: Front-end and back-end development on Symfony based projects
